name: X-1 (LD50 Compo - 48 Hours)
description:
Delay X-1's shutdown by reaching charge stations littered across the map! Explore with your jetpack as you search for power to stay alive.

All assets were made by me within the 48 hours except for the following SFX. (this might conflict with compo ruling, if so I'll change submission type accordingly)
